prop.name: course
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The course where this action was taken.

prop.name: sportsTeam
prop.desc: A sub property of participant. The sports team that participated on this action.

prop.name: sportsEvent
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The sports event where this action occurred.

prop.name: distance
prop.desc: The distance travelled, e.g. exercising or travelling.

prop.name: opponent
prop.desc: A sub property of participant. The opponent on this action.

prop.name: sportsActivityLocation
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The sports activity location where this action occurred.

prop.name: toLocation
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The final location of the object or the agent after the action.

prop.name: fromLocation
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The original location of the object or the agent before the action.

prop.name: exerciseCourse
prop.desc: A sub property of location. The course where this action was taken.

PlayAction.name: audience
PlayAction.desc: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.

PlayAction.name: event
PlayAction.desc: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.
